wikipedia_page.main: Sir Richard Portway Dobson (11 February 1914 - 24 October 1993) was an English businessman. He was one of the most prominent businesspeople in post-war Britain. He spent most of his career at British American Tobacco, where he rose to the position of executive chairman. He also served as chairman of British Leyland.

response: Richard Dobson is an American singer-songwriter.
Richard Dobson may also refer to:
*Ritchie Neville (born 1979), real name Richard Dobson, English singer
